message.body: Three years ago today was our first away tournament!!! Whaaaaat?
Lmao wow holy shit, you definitely got that wrong, we didn.t debate in october?
Uh maybe we did. But Newark was def on nov 6 2009. Maybe it was our second. But still three years aghhhh
Yeah holy shit, our lives were permanently changed by debate. How you spending your election day?
I've got class all day and step practice tonight but I'm gonna try to watch as much of the election on tv as i can. How bout you? Did you vote???
Lmao nigga you know i cant vote
I thought you applied for citizenship when you turned 18??
Its so fucking cold i might as well be living in colorado
Omg I heard it was snowing, is it true?? It's pretty cold down here as well
Its brick as FUCK and i dont have any gloves hats love
Ain't got no love to keep you warm?
Nope :( its okay no school for me tomorrow :D
You haven't had school for like two weeks already. Did you get power back and everything? What about the subways? Just go out and have a snowball fight and forget about these troubles
Lmao yeah i did miss school for a week and everythings getting back to normal and then this snowstorm comes and ruins everything. And i gotta wake up at5:30 but wutevahh whatsup with you man?

Im getting really busy as the end of the term approaches. But ofc there's always time for fun. There's a really interesting work hard/play hard dynamic on this campus. I've been happy with the cold weather but it probably won't ever snow down here :( I also feel the happiest and healthiest I probably ever have in my life
